forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
Today's skies over Downtown San Francisco are a brilliant canvas of sunny blue, inviting all to step outside and savor the gentle warmth. The midday warmth approaches 67 degrees, but don't be deceived; a hint of coolness lingers in the breezes coming from the west southwest, gently brushing through the streets at a comfortable pace. As the afternoon unfolds, expect those temperatures to mellow to a soothing 64 degrees, encouraging a leisurely exploration of the burgeoning city life. The air remains buoyant, with gusts whispering through the city, a reminder of the ever-present vitality of urban existence.

As the sun descends, the clear night will wrap itself around the city like a cozy blanket, with the temperature settling around 52 degrees. With the winds continuing their quiet serenade, an evening stroll down along the Embarcadero could be quite enchanting, as the lights of the bay reflect off the shimmering waters, offering a perfect backdrop for a thoughtful conversation or simply a moment of solitude. Dressing in layers would serve you well—perhaps a light jacket over a comfy tee to transition seamlessly from the warmth of day to the cool embrace of night. Take this opportunity to slip into a local café, watch the world buzz by, or join a friend for a casual meal at a hidden gem—allow your spirit to revel in the uncomplicated pleasures that this splendid day offers.
